iep_goals: Use appropriate social greetings and responses in 8 out of 10 opportunities
Participate in group activities for 15 minutes with minimal prompting
accommodations: Quiet space for breaks when overwhelmed
learning_styles: benefits from predictable routines and structure

interviews.parent: Parent reports Emma is very bright but has difficulty with social interactions and changes in routine.
interviews.teacher: Emma excels academically but needs support during unstructured times like recess.

observations.psychologist: Above-average cognitive abilities with challenges in social communication and flexibility.
